content.raw:
In the context of simulations in general, validation is often performed qualitatively on a scenario-specific basis ("Does the simulation represent the essential aspects of the physical system?")  

The kind of tool that you are investigating is going to have to be a metric-based approach. In the absence of better information, the metric of minimum (signed) change in work necessary to move from one configuration to another is a reasonable first choice.
